greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = number of forests of labeled rooted trees of height at most 1, with n labels, where each root contains k labels, n>=0, 0<=k<=n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: T(n,k) = n! * Sum_{i=0..u(n,k)} i^(n-k*i)/((n-k*i)!*i!*k!^i) with u(n,k) = 0 if k=0 and u(n,k) = floor(n/k) else.
mathematica: t[n_, n_] = 1; t[_, 0] = 0; t[n_, k_] := n!*Sum[i^(n-k*i)/((n-k*i)!*i!*k!^i), {i, 0, n/k}]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 12}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 19 2013 *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 12 2008
